title: Rain (Part 1)
body:
Rain (Part 1)

In a darkly lit room, Evan slowly opened his eyes. A momentary look of confusion flashed in his dark black eyes, then he remembered what had happened before he fainted.

Remembering what had happened before he fainted, he quickly sat up and looked around him to assess his surroundings.

After seeing that he was lying on a comfortable bed instead of lying naked under the blue sky, he heaved a sigh of relief and looked at the condition of his body.

'It must be my shadow undeads who took out the clothes from my shadow storage and dressed me' Evan thought when he saw he was wearing one of the outfits that were inside his shadow storage.

Once he assessed his situation, Evan used his spiritual senses and noticed he was in the building where he had stayed on his first night after coming to the dungeon town.

Asher and his shadow undeads were standing guard outside of his room and Kazil, Volac and Eclipse were hidden inside the room where he was sleeping.
